content.question: The Jefferson administration advocated which of the following changes as a means of restoring republican ideals?

choices.label: Abolishing the Bank of the United States
Reducing the scope of activities of the federal government
Discontinuing the funding of state debts
Increasing the size of the United States military
Adopting the Kentucky and Virginia Resolutions at the national level

content.answer: Reducing the scope of activities of the federal government

topic.text: 4.2: The Rise of Political Parties and the Era of Jefferson

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
